generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved street with cars parked along both sides and a visible Mercedes-Benz logo on the dashboard, indicating the perspective is from a vehicle on the road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, adjacent to the parked cars and buildings.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and possibly commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background and along the street, with some foliage showing.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along both sides of the street, including a black car in the foreground on the left and a black Mercedes-Benz station wagon on the right.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign with a red border is visible on the right side of the street, mounted on a pole.
